content.html: It’s the first day of a new month and a new year! - check your cloud spend, your certs haven’t expired, update your hard coded webpage footers / and twitter headlines / anything else you hard coded to 2021. Have an awesome day!
content.value:
It’s the first day of a new month and a new year! - check your cloud spend, your certs haven’t expired, update your hard coded webpage footers / and twitter headlines / anything else you hard coded to 2021. 

Have an awesome day!
